article_title: Sharp exchanges as Matt Bevin and Jack Conway face off at Farm Bureau forum
article_text: In a preview of what promises to be a bitter fall campaign, Kentucky's two major party candidates for governor traded verbal blows as they faced off Thursday at the Kentucky Farm Bureau's "Measure the Candidates" forum.
